abstract: New York City detective, after failing to subdue parolee Brian Quattrocchi with stun gun, shoots and wounds him after Quattrocchi stabbed former girlfriend Olga Pichardo and held her at knifepoint; confrontation highlights usefulness and limitations of non-lethal weapons used by police.
lead_paragraph: The shooting followed an attempt by officers to use a stun gun to subdue the man, who was holding his former girlfriend at knife point in her apartment, the authorities said.
snippet: The shooting followed an attempt by officers to use a stun gun to subdue the man, who was holding his former girlfriend at knife point in her apartment, the authorities said.

headline.main: Detective Shoots Man During Stabbing in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Detective Shoots Man During Stabbing in Manhattan
